message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $180. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I am willing to pay $140 for it.
I appreciate your willingness to make an offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with $150 for the product.
